NO_BOOKS_FOUND: No books found. Use the "Sync Books" command to import your GoodReads library.
CONFIGURE_RSS: Please configure your GoodReads RSS URL in settings.
SETTINGS_RSS_DESC: Copy your "My Books" RSS feed URL from GoodReads.
SETTINGS_FOLDER_DESC: Folder where book notes will be created.
SETTINGS_FORCE_SYNC_DESC: Manually sync your GoodReads library now.
SETTINGS_GALLERY_TAB_DESC: The title displayed at the top of the gallery view.
SETTINGS_VIEW_NAME_DESC: The display name of the gallery tab.
